滽字的基本解释

滽
yōng
〔滽滽水〕古河名。a.在今中国河南省嵩县；b.在今中国河南省孟津县。

滽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yōng］
［《廣韻》餘封切，平鐘，以。］
见“滽滽”。

滽字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　滽； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页644第16
【廣韻】【集韻】?餘封切，音容。水名。【山海經】宜蘇之山，滽滽之水出焉。○按《水經》作庸庸，出河南垣縣。　又【山海經】扶豬山西曰釐山，滽滽之水出焉。【名勝志】釐山，在嵩縣西。【水經注】今水出陸渾縣之西南王母㵎。

滽字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
滽字的起名意思

滽滽水,古河名。

Twilight
Basic explanation of words
Twilight
yōng
〔滽滽水〕The name of the ancient river. a. In Song County, Henan Province, China; b. In Mengjin County, Henan Province, China.
Twilight
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yōng］
["Guangyun" Yu Fengqie, Pingzhong, to. ]
See "滽滽".
Twilight
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　滽; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 644 16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Fengqie, voice volume. Water name. [Shan Hai Jing] Yisu is the mountain, and the water of the river flows out of Yan. ○According to "Shui Jing" as Yongyong, out of Yuan County, Henan.　[Shan Hai Jing] To help the pig in Shanxi, it is called Lishan, and the water of Twilight comes out of Yan. [Famous Places] Lishan, in the west of Song County. 【Shui Jing Zhu】The queen mother of the southwest of Luhun County is now out of the water.
Twilight
